remarks: Associative law for the multiplication operation of a ring. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
ringcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ringcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ringass $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .x. Y ) .x. Z ) = ( X .x. ( Y .x. Z ) ) ) $.
